name: Dark Consumption
description: Dark Consumption is a rouge-lite dungeon survival game. The game has simple elements such as hunger, hydration, and the resource Ember. During your runs you’ll be navigating a dark dungeon with only your Ember light to help you see. If the Ember light gets extinguish you will be consumed by the darkness. There are many traps around the dungeon so mind your step. There is also shades that roam the dungeon, try to avoid them as much as possible. A simple crafting system is in place to help you craft antidotes and bandages. Scavenge for resources risking the chance to get consumed by the dark or go as quick as possible to the exit but risk the chance of dying due to lack of resources.
